named-native-query.name: Pedidos.totalPorMes
named-native-query.query: select date_format(data_criacao, '%Y/%m') mes, count(*) total from pedido where data_criacao > date_sub(now(), interval 6 month) and status = 'FINALIZADO' group by date_format(data_criacao, '%Y/%m') order by date_format(data_criacao, '%Y/%m') desc;
